Assessment.QuestionText: Which one of the following codes will display the <font face="courier new">Account Number</font> and <font face="courier new">Name</font> from <font face="courier new">Bank</font> database using <font face="courier new">SqlConnection</font>, <font face="courier new">SqlCommand</font>, and <font face="courier new">SqlDataReader</font> classes?

Options.Option:
SqlConnection sqlconBank = new SqlConnection("Data Source=localhost;Initial Catalog=Bank;Integrated Security=SSPI;");
SqlCommand sqlcomBank = new SqlCommand("SELECT AccNo,FirstName FROM Customer", sqlconBank);
SqlDataReader sqldreaderBankInfo = sqlcomBank.ExecuteReader();
String accnumber = "";
String name = "";
while (sqldreaderBankInfo.Read())
{
  accnumber = sqldreaderBankInfo["AccNo"].ToString();
  name = sqldreaderBankInfo["FirstName"].ToString();
  MessageBox.Show("Account Number & Name: " + accnumber + "," + name);
}
sqldreaderBankInfo.Close();
